text: @Milbank Are you really that stupid? Perhaps you need new hearing aids. He NEVER said that the coronavirus is a hoax. He said the democrats saying he’s not doing anything to monitor the virus situation, is the hoax. You are a damn liar! I cant wait till Trump wins in November. Liar!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
